sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2510 ( DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD , ROTA_DUTY_BGNN_TM , ROTA_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_DUTY_TM_NUM , ROTA_DUTY_EEPN_TM_NUM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_EXTNN_EEPN_TM_NUM , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_NGT_EEPN_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dutyDivCd# , #stpInttnSeptVal# , #rotaDutyDivCd# , #rotaDutyBgnnTm# , #rotaDutyEndTm# , #rotaDutyTmNum# , #rotaDutyEepnTmNum# , #extnnDutyBgnnTm# , #extnnDutyEndTm# , #rotaExtnnEepnTmNum# , #ngtDutyBgnnTm# , #ngtDutyEndTm# , #rotaNgtEepnTmNum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2510 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# , ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD=#rotaDutyDivCd# , ROTA_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#rotaDutyBgnnTm# , ROTA_DUTY_END_TM=#rotaDutyEndTm# , ROTA_DUTY_TM_NUM=#rotaDutyTmNum# , ROTA_DUTY_EEPN_TM_NUM=#rotaDutyEepnTmNum# , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#extnnDutyBgnnTm# , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM=#extnnDutyEndTm# , ROTA_EXTNN_EEPN_TM_NUM=#rotaExtnnEepnTmNum# , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#ngtDutyBgnnTm# , NGT_DUTY_END_TM=#ngtDutyEndTm# , ROTA_NGT_EEPN_TM_NUM=#rotaNgtEepnTmNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# AND ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD=#rotaDutyDivCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# AND ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD=#rotaDutyDivCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD , ROTA_DUTY_BGNN_TM , ROTA_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_DUTY_TM_NUM , ROTA_DUTY_EEPN_TM_NUM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_EXTNN_EEPN_TM_NUM , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_NGT_EEPN_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2510 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# AND ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD=#rotaDutyDivCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD , ROTA_DUTY_BGNN_TM , ROTA_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_DUTY_TM_NUM , ROTA_DUTY_EEPN_TM_NUM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_EXTNN_EEPN_TM_NUM , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , ROTA_NGT_EEPN_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DUTY_DIV_CD DESC , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL DESC , ROTA_DUTY_DIV_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2510 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
